content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Farhad Abbasi,

Let's negotiate the rental price for the apartment. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 200 Euro per month sounds fair for this apartment, considering its size and location.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 200 Euro per month is far too low for the value of the apartment. I'm looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 300 Euro per month sounds more reasonable.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's better, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 350 Euro per month is my final offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's still not high enough for me. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 400 Euro per month is my final offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 450 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 450 Euro per month! TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
